title: Turner's Syndrome : trials and triumphs

abstract: 'I can never forget feeling intimidated and inferior.'
description: Living with Turner's Syndrome, Jackie Breasley has had to overcome many difficulties. As she grows up, she has faced much more heartbreaking challenges. Regardless, these challenges all present Breasley with opportunities to triumph.
